name: perversity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being strange and not what most people would do or expect: I think she disagreed with me out of sheer perversity.
sexual behaviour that is considered strange and unpleasant by most people: The author of the book seems to be obsessed with sexual perversity. See
perverse
